title: How On Earth
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. From-scratch cafe as well a shop providing local and sustainable grocery needs. Sources from local farms, compost on site, and offer homesteading workshops. Each day one of the soups is veg/vegan, and offers a vegan burger, green salads, along with weekly specials. Kitchen can work with your dietary/allergy concerns.
